title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.2 - Water delivery
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.2 - Water delivery

State Regulations

All potable water not provided to the retail food store
directly from the source by pipe shall be delivered in a bulk water transport
system and shall be transferred to a closed water system. Both of these systems
shall be constructed, maintained and operated according to 10 NYCRR Part
5. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-6.2

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
